text: Panama Buena Vista Union School District is a K-8 public school district in Bakersfield, California. The district has 23 schools, and serves Southwest Bakersfield.Schools . Panama Buena Vista School District. Accessed: 03-23-2011. ==References== ==External links== *Panama Buena Vista Union School District Category:School districts in Kern County, California Category:Educational institutions established in 1875
